name: Marin Hollow
description:
From the author of "The Friday Night West Texas Deadkillers' Club" ;

Marin Hollow is a suburb of San Antonio, nestled between Highway 17 and the Balcones escarpment, where atmospheric currents from the Gulf of Mexico crash like waves against the edges of the hill country, dumping an amount of rain unusual for the region onto Marin County, and where, as of late, there has been an unusual plenitude of supernatural entities.

!This game contains visual elements that may not be suitable for players with photosensitive epilepsy!
